proposal: Understanding the critical mission of ending hunger and transforming lives, it's impressive how Bread for the World is making strides in addressing global hunger hotspots. With 43 holders in the ETH network already on board, your commitment is clear. Imagine amplifying this impact by integrating our DEX and Lottery tools, enabling broader community engagement and revenue sharing opportunities. Together, we can create a sustainable ecosystem that not only supports your vision but also empowers every community member to contribute to this noble cause. Let's make a difference, one transaction at a time.
